data.description: State estimation based on line-flow measurements. Detection and correction of incorrect on-line measurements. Reduction techniques. Network security evaluation. On-line contingency studies and contingency remedial action. Calculation of penalty factors and optimal power dispatch strategies. On-line stability determination. Parallel processors for on-line studies. Knowledge of basic probability analysis [such asE C E 331,STAT/​MATH  431, orSTAT 311] strongly encouraged.
data.title: ON-LINE CONTROL OF POWER SYSTEMS
